graph_title: Gross enrolment of children 3 -5 years of age in pre-school education
indicator_name: Gross enrolment of children 3 -5 years of age in pre-school education
national_indicator_description: The indicator of gross enrollment of children aged 3-5 in pre-school institutions is the proportion of 3-5 years old children attending pre-school institutions from the population of the corresponding age
computation_definitions: Preschool age: child's 0-6 years old. A pupil - a child of preschool age studying in the pre-school education and development program.
computation_calculations: The ratio of 3-5 years old children attending preschool to the population in corresponding age.
